text: allahge kæmættata anuva (ohuge) niyogayanta avanata vimata misa kisidu dharma dutayaku api noevvemu. sæbævinma ovun ovuntama aparadha karagat avasthavaka, ovun numba veta pæmina, tavada ovun allah gen samava ayæda sitiyadi, rasul varaya ( vana obat) ovun venuven samava æyada sitiye nam, allah papaksamava piliganna lesat, asamasama karunavanta lesat ovun dæka ganu æta
